name: S3K The Crown of Midnight
description:
A tie-in game to the Critically Acclaimed Animated Series, Soldier, Soldier, Soldier, King, S3K The Crown of Midnight was thought lost to history when the original creator's office was set ablaze in 2001. Now the game's demo has been faithfully reconstructed from fragmented data by yours truly, so that all fans of S3K can experience the thrill of this lost chapter. Featuring 10 Playable characters including Luey, Duey, Huey, The Ghost, King Terry, and Master Glizzard. Battle your friends in intense 2-4 person local multiplayer, or face the clock alone in the Speed Trials.

In all seriousness, I threw together this meme in practically a weekend. Hope you all can get some enjoyment out of it, or at least laugh at it.

See the How to Play Community post for more info.
